ygData.messageBody:
According to Brian K. Rhees:
> I go through 10 to 20 bloodstones a night. I personally find that
> retrieving my corpse even once is more frustrating than the 10pp it costs
> for my daily habit. Be careful casting it though in the middle of a fight.
> Mobs hate it. :)

It adds the amount of HP you're protecting against to the monster's score list
for you, if you are already in their score list. So, basically, they consider
you have hit them for the same damage :)
